title: Chemistry Lab
subtitle: Virtual Chemistry Experiments
description: Learn chemistry through fun virtual experiments. Test pH levels, observe solubility, and explore states of matter!

acid_base.title: Acid-Base Reactions
acid_base.description: Test the pH of different substances
acid_base.tip: Acids have pH below 7, neutral is exactly 7, and bases (alkaline) have pH above 7

solubility.title: Solubility
solubility.description: Observe how substances dissolve in water
solubility.tip: Some substances dissolve easily in water (like salt and sugar), while others don't dissolve at all (like sand and oil)

ph_scale.title: pH Scale
ph_scale.description: Learn about the pH scale from 0 to 14
ph_scale.tip: The pH scale measures how acidic or basic a substance is. Lower numbers are more acidic, 7 is neutral, and higher numbers are more basic

states_matter.title: States of Matter
states_matter.description: See how temperature affects the state of matter
states_matter.tip: Matter changes state with temperature. Below 0°C water is solid (ice), between 0-100°C it's liquid (water), and above 100°C it's gas (steam)
